definition: to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)
to plagiarize/to copy/to attack the flank or rear of an enemy
to carry on as before/to follow (an old custom etc)
to invade/(of a storm etc) to strike/to hit
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to follow old patterns/to imitate existing models/to continue along the same lines

sentences.english: Upon Duke Ning's death, his son Jia Daihua succeeded him on the official position.
sentences.chinese: 宁公死后，贾代化袭了官，也养了两个儿子。

sentences.english: The three side not to worry, thirteen hit Fuping hou.
sentences.chinese: 七国三边未到忧，十三身袭富平侯。

sentences.english: There\'s heat in the breathless August day already.
sentences.chinese: 没有一丝风的八月天，热气已经开始袭来。

sentences.english: A storm system is barrelling in.
When the breeze fell it would be cool from the sea.
sentences.chinese: 即使风停了，海边的凉意也会阵阵袭来。

sentences.english: Sooner or later, the wave will come along and knock down what we have worked so hard to build up.
sentences.chinese: 浪涛迟早会袭来摧毁我们辛勤劳动所建造起来的一切。

sentences.english: No one was prepared when the storm took its course and flooded the small town.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨在大家都没有防备之下来袭，淹没了小镇。

sentences.english: Shooting pains were assailing my arms and chest, and the muscles in my legs were joining in.
sentences.chinese: 胳膊和胸部的疼痛一阵阵袭来，然后是大腿。

sentences.english: The crowd quicky melted away when the storm broke.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨袭来，人群很快地四散了。

sentences.english: And send a region more in this accident, most bloodcurdling experience in quick succession comes over.
sentences.chinese: 而在这个事故多发地带，最恐怖的经历接二连三袭来。

sentences.english: He was airlifted to hospital and has now been taken off the critical list.
sentences.chinese: 被袭男孩被空运到医院，现在已经脱离危险期。

sentences.english: The intensively colored classic furniture with superb elegance and nobility.
sentences.chinese: 极致优雅，贵气袭人的厚妆幻彩经典家具。

sentences.english: The hungry beasts were storming our position.
sentences.chinese: 那饥饿的野兽正凶猛地向我们袭来。

sentences.english: Attacked fraud busters awarded only 2600 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 打假斗士方舟子被袭只获2600元赔偿。

sentences.english: Even in complimenting Gates, my own neediness would rear up.
sentences.chinese: 即使要向盖茨表示赞美，我的自卑也会袭来。

sentences.english: The waves of cheering broke over him.
sentences.chinese: 阵阵欢呼声浪潮般向他袭来。

definition: to drape over one's shoulders/to open/to unroll/to split open/to spread out
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves
